BLIST.TITLE: Cracking unsalted MD5 passwords
BLIST.ITEM:
Use a site such as passcracking.comhttp://www.passcracking.com
enHTML.
If the password in not in the MD5 database, submit it to the MD5 rainbow.

Use a tools such as Cain & Abelhttp://www.oxid.it
enHTML
Use Winrtgen (which is part of Cain & Abel) to generate the rainbow tables,
then start Cain
click on the Cracker tab
select MD5 Hashes
right click, select Add to list, and add the MD5-encrypted password.
select one or more lines
right click, select Cryptanalysis Attack via Rainbow Tables.
add the tables and click Start.
